class.name: VisualScriptReturn
class.brief_description: Exits a function and returns an optional value.
class.description: Ends the execution of a function and returns control to the calling function. Optionally, it can return a [Variant] value. [b]Input Ports:[/b] - Sequence - Data (variant): [code]result[/code] (optional) [b]Output Ports:[/b] none

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the [code]return[/code] input port is available.
